content: **size** lovey receiving **measurements** width 30 5 71 cm / 12 28 length 28 63 5 cm /11 25 **materials** bella coco merino 1 3 balls in shade powder 05 a 1 2 balls in shade sky blue 12 b **hook** crochet hook 4 5 mm / us 7 **yarn quality** bella coco merino hobbii 100 % wool 50 g 1 75 oz = 165 m 180 yds **gauge** 18 sts x 11 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 measured over main stitch pattern **pattern information** this pattern is made to showcase the beautiful bella coco merino yarn the yarn is super soft on the skin and merino helps to regulate body temperature making it perfect for baby blankets crocheted using the main wavy stitch pattern throughout changing colour every 2 row this pattern uses basic stitches making it perfect for confident beginners and beyond a simple border is added at the end to create a modern sleek look this pattern contains a stitch chart and includes instructions for lovey and receiving blanket sizes photo credit nicola white photography
